name: Human Intersection
description:
=Human Intersection=

This game was made in Unity for a College Assignment in the Game Tools module. 

For this assignment, we were required to submit a 3D game demonstrating are competence at level design and game development for Unity. The there for the game was Adventure. This Game was heavily inspired by Animal Crossing, since that is what I've been playing heavily over the last couple of days during quarantine.

Below are assets used:

Music - 

  • Cute - https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/cute 
  • Wood Whack - http://soundbible.com/605-Wood-Whack.html

Fonts - 

  • Funny & Cute - https://www.dafont.com/funny-cute.font 
  • Cocogoose -  https://www.dafont.com/cocogoose.font

Art Assets -

  • Character - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/character-pack-free-sample-79870
  • Voxel Animals - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/voxel-animals-pack-133366
  • Platformer Kit - https://kenney.nl/assets/platformer-kit
  • Nature Pack - https://kenney.nl/assets/nature-pack
  • Fantasy Town Kit - https://kenney.nl/assets/fantasy-town-kit
  • UI Pack - https://kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack
